weakness.name: Unexpected Environment Condition
weakness.desc:
This is a generic weakness that includes several different situations, they are all related to unexpected environmental conditions and they could be related to: 
  • Misconfiguration.
  • Uncleared buffers, shared memory, files, etc. 
  • Problems between the interaction of two different entities that cause unexpected behavior.

test.steps:
Identify the areas of the application that can be affected by the following causes:
  1. Misconfiguration.
  2. Uncleared buffers, shared memory, files, etc. 
  3. Problems between the interaction of two different entities that cause unexpected behavior.
Perform testing on them to look for a security problem.
